text: Eghtɨ guivir kamɨn pam aremeghtɨ a pura ikiam, o an pam aneteghtɨ, a pura ikɨva, boriba puvatɨgh, uamategh uan afeziamɨn dɨpenimɨn mangɨ, kamaghɨn, an ofa gamir gumazibar daghebar amɨ, kar dagher an afeziam inigh izamiba. Eghtɨ gumazim o amizim ofa gamir gumazibar adarazir aven itir puvatɨ, a daman markɨ. Bar markɨ.
